title: Women as Subject and Object in Art History
description: Exploration of the role of women in the visual arts. Women as artists, women as portrayed in art, and feminist theory as it applies to the study of the visual arts and art history. 4 lectures. Crosslisted as ART/WGSÂ 316.
prerequisites: ART 111, ART 112 or ART 211 or ART 212, or consent of instructor
